start_game.author: valery
texts:
Hello! It's not often we get visitors...
You're in Towny! Population 2...

I'm Mayor Valery, and I live here with my wife Helena.
We moved here when we got sick of the city life.

There's nothing here - no shops or no tourist spots...

...What? You came here because you want to live here?

That's wonderful news! I have the perfect place for you!

As you can see, there's no other houses here, so you'll need to build your own.
Click on a "For Sale" sign where you want to build. I hope you know enough HTML to get started!
